long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
LibKey Search
Search the LibKey database directly from the browser. Highlight any PMID or DOI text on a webpage, right-click, and choose "Search LibKey for 'selected text'" to quickly perform a search via the LibKey database of the WA Health Library holdings.
